description: Kaerichi no Koribuu is a pirate captain famous for killing marines who was at the Sabaody Archipelago around the time of the Mugiwara no Ichimi` reunion. He, along with his brother Nuregami no Karibuu, another infamous rookie, joined the Nise Mugiwara no Ichimi temporarily. He has a bounty of 190,000,000, making him part of the new generation of rookies, following in the path of Luffy and the other Supernovas with bounties over 100,000,000.
name: Koribuu
